name: milli-py (AlexAltea)
description: [项目级] Python bindings for Milli, the embeddable Rust-based search engine powering Meilisearch。来源: https://github.com/AlexAltea/milli-py

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
Python bindings for Milli, the embeddable Rust-based search engine powering Meilisearch

来源: https://github.com/AlexAltea/milli-py
语言: Rust
Stars: 135

genes.title: 项目结构
genes.content:
Cargo.lock
Cargo.toml
LICENSE
README.md
benchmarks
benchmarks/bench.py
benchmarks/requirements.txt
docs
docs/index.md
meilisearch
pyproject.toml
requirements.txt
src
src/conv.rs
src/lib.rs
test.py
tests
tests/__init__.py
tests/test_milli_index.py

genes.title: 使用方法
genes.content:
import milli

index = milli.Index("path/to/index")
index.add_documents([   
    { "id": 0, "title": "Hello world", "content": "This is a sample" },
    { "id": 1, "title": "Hello moon", "content": "This is another sample" },
    { "id": 2, "title": "Hello sun", "content": "This is yet another sample" },
])
results = index.search("wrold")
document = index.get_document(results[0])
assert(document['title'] == "Hello world")
